name: Dustinator X9001
description:
Did you ever feel like you would like to be a robotic vacuum cleaner?
Well, here is your chance!
Clean the house, One Room at a time, while listening to relaxing music.
Clean up all the dust but don't run out of energy.
Return to your power station to recharge whenever you feel the need.
Did we mention that you have a bad memory?
You may remember the chair to be in that spot, but it probably is somewhere else now.
The dust may also be someplace other than you remember seeing it.
But with the patented robotic patience you will manage to clean all rooms.

Just don't wake up the cat.
Seriously. Don't. We mean it.
And stay away from those puddles.

Controls: WASD to move, M to mute vacuum.

Created for Ludum Dare 37 - One Room

Technology: Unity, Blender, Krita, Paint.net, Ableton Live, Cubase Elements, Cubase 5

Team:
Programming: Rebecca, Botan, Hagen, Johannes
Graphics and Modelling: Rebeccy, Botan, Johannes
Music: Michael, Linh, Maria, Klobtrooper
